thread.title: BRIEF-Canadian procurement minister says Boeing will stand equal chance in competition to supply jets

title: BRIEF-Canadian procurement minister says Boeing will stand equal chance in competition to supply jets
text: February 22, 2018 / 9:37 PM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Canadian procurement minister says Boeing will stand equal chance in competition to supply jets Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 22 (Reuters) - CANADIAN PROCUREMENT MINISTER SAYS BOEING WILL STAND EQUAL CHANCE IN COMPETITION TO SUPPLY CANADA WITH FIGHTER JETS DESPITE BOMBARDIER DISPUTE CANADIAN PROCUREMENT MINISTER SAYS CANADA DEFINITELY STAYING IN CONSORTIUM THAT HELPED FUND DEVELOPMENT OF LOCKHEED MARTIN‘S LMT.N F-35 FIGHTERF-35 FIGHTER CANADIAN PROCUREMENT MINISTER SAYS OTTAWA CAN DESIGN BIDDING PROCESS FOR FIGHTER JETS THAT DOESN‘T GIVE UNFAIR ADVANTAGE TO F-35 Further company coverage: (Reporting by David Ljunggren)
